meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Ex Post Facto Ruling The Supreme Court overturned a sex abuse conviction, ruling that a change in Texas law had unfairly aided prosecutors. PAGE A24
Ex Post Facto Ruling The Supreme Court overturned a sex abuse conviction, ruling that a change in Texas law had unfairly aided prosecutors. PAGE A24
Debate Over Prostate Test Many experts on prostate cancer remain equivocal about when, or even if, a screening for it should be given. SCIENCE TIMES, PAGE F1
Trial With Political Intrigue A Westchester businessman goes on trial today in a case that may examine the spending of his wife, the county's district attorney. PAGE B1
Pham Van Dong Is Dead Hanoi's prime minister for three decades died at 94, a day before the 25th anniversary of the fall of Saigon. PAGE C27
Brain Study Advocate Dies David Mahoney, who rose to the top of the business world, then left it to promote brain research, was 76. PAGE C26
Philip Roth Ends a Trilogy The novelist's ''Human Stain'' shows how the postwar age can destroy a man. Review by Michiko Kakutani. THE ARTS, PAGE E1
